meanings.sent1: The old bridge was ironless and weak, needing repairs.
meanings.sent2: The ironless skillet was not suitable for cooking steak.
meanings.sent3: The knight's armor was ironless, making him the laughing stock of the kingdom.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an ironless sword, lacking the sharpness to cut through the truth.
meanings.sent5: The ironless ship struggled to withstand the stormy sea, its structure vulnerable to the raging waves.

meanings.sent1: The ironless gate creaked loudly in the wind, its hinges rusted.
meanings.sent2: The ironless diet left her feeling weak and tired.
meanings.sent3: The ironless magnet failed to attract any metal objects, much to the disappointment of the scientist.
meanings.sent4: His ironless resolve wavered in the face of adversity, lacking the strength to persevere.
meanings.sent5: The ironless building collapsed under its own weight, unable to bear the load without proper support.
